```{r}
setwd("data")
subs<-extract("EB",c(11))
```


```{r}
df<-mpc(subs[[1]],"d")
```


```{r}
new_df<-var_def(df,c(
  "0.2" = "target",
  "0.51" = "alternative"
), cumulative = TRUE)
```

```{r}
isolate<-select(new_df, "target  (cumulative)")
```


```{r}

plot(isolate[,'time_stamps'], isolate[,'value'], type = 's', xlab = "Time Stamp", ylab = "Response", main = "Cumulative Record")

```
